titles.title: A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to designate a 3-digit dialing code for veterans in crisis.
SPEED Act
SPEED Act
Suicide Prevention by Eliminating Excessive Digits Act of 2019
Suicide Prevention by Eliminating Excessive Digits Act of 2019
SPEED Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Suicide Prevention by Eliminating Excessive Digits Act of 2019 or the SPEED Act
This bill requires the Federal Communications Commission to designate a three-digit dialing code that veterans may use to reach a national suicide prevention and mental health crisis hotline system.
